Apps for Good APP NAME Press to give feedback APP LOGO What language (as a Alpha-3/ISO 639-2 Language Code) should the book be written in? Who is your favorite author? What book length do you prefer? What publication time period do you prefer?
On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does author impact your book preferences? On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does length impact your book preferences? On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does publication year impact your book preferences? On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does average rating impact your book preferences? On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does book popularity impact your preferences?
Type in the alpha-3/ISO 639-2 code of your preferred language. Alpha-3/ISO 639-2 Language Codes Type in your favorite author. Short: Less Than 200 Pages Medium: 200 to 500 Pages Long: Over 500 Pages Late 1900s: 1950-2000 2000s
